actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to direct the Clerk of the House of Representatives to provide each Member of the House with additional copies of his individual voting record for distribution by that Member for public inspection in his congressional district, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to provide each Member of the House with additional copies of his individual voting record for distribution by that Member for public inspection in his congressional district.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to direct the Clerk of the House of Representatives to provide each Member of the House with additional copies of his individual voting record for distribution by that Member for public inspection in his congressional district, and for other purposes.
